title: The Blue dog safety video
creator_credit: Bill Pettigrew and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Wally the dog is trained in home safety and his first assignment is to protect Junior, an adorable baby whose parents are safety-challenged. Accidents and near-accidents occur with lightning speed around their home, but Wally is always there to save the day. Over 40 important home safety tips are presented in a delightfully entertaining manner in this award winning Canadian program.
